items.metataghtml: <meta name="description" content="Walker Tape®’s Walker Signature Remover breaks down adhesive quickly and works on all systems and adhesive types.">
items.storedetaileddescription:
Walker Tape®’s Walker Signature Remover breaks down adhesive quickly and works on all systems and adhesive types. Walker Signature Remover uses an organic, oil-based formula that’s safe for all systems and has medical grade gentleness. It is our fastest solvent for clients with sensitive skin.

Keep the product away from heat, humidity, and light. Store in a well-ventilated, cool, dark, dry, room-temperature controlled environment (60-80°F). Close bottle lids tightly.

With proper storage, our liquid products have a shelf life of up to six months.
items.outofstockbehavior: Allow back orders with no out-of-stock message
items.featureddescription:
Flammable – Do not store or use near heat, sparks, or open flame.
Close lid tightly.
Do not apply to broken, cut, or irritated skin.
External use only, do not ingest.
Avoid eye contact.
Keep out of reach of children.
Test on a small area before use.
Store in a well-ventilated, cool, dark, dry, room-temperature controlled environment (60-80°F).
items.displayname: Walker Signature Remover - 4 fl oz, Spray
items.storedisplayname2: Walker Signature Remover - 4 fl oz, Spray
items.storedescription:
Apply directly to the edge of the tape while gently pulling until completely separated from skin. Wipe off any remaining residue. Follow with soap and water for final cleaning.

Apply generously on adhesive area for best results.

We recommend performing a patch test before use.
items.pagetitle: Walker Signature Remover - 4 fl oz, Spray | Walker Tape
